head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GARAUFIS, GEORGE N.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GARAUFIS, GEORGE N.

block.p: GARAUFIS--George N., 87, of Bayside, New York on January 27, 2007. Devoted husband of Demetria, beloved father of Nicholas and Michael and father-in-law of Betsy and Nancy, adoring grandfather of Katharine, James, Michael, Jr. and Matthew. Proud graduate of Stuyvesant High School, The Cooper Union and the Central Park public tennis courts. Services and interment private. Memorial contributions to The Cooper Union for the Advancement of Science and Art.
